channel.title: Dueling!
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
How do i make it so you can only get the right click option for duel in a certain area? Short and sweet. :P
All help is appreciated.
Thanx :)

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Err when i do that and run server it says stack unavailable ( or something of the sort) and stays on loading screen when logging in Any ideas?

All help is appreciated.

Thanx!

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

put a } after if((absX >= 2744 && absX <= 2730 && absY >= 3475 && absY <= 3462)){ outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey man thanx,

I have 1 problem though, I’m using a devolution 7.0 server source and i added where you told me but…I get an error, This is my right-click menu:

// add player commands...
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(1); // command slot
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("Trade with");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeString("Duel");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
if((absX >= 2744 && absX <= 2730 && absY >= 3475 && absY <= 3462)){
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeString("Attack");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

My error is:

client.java:6610: illegal start of expression
public void initializeClientConfiguration() {
^

1 error

All help is appreciated.

Thanx!

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

search

outStream.writeString("Kick");

then add this

if((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)){ outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Challenge"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();}
edit thanks for reminding me!
ill start working on full dueling ;]

Read full topic
